content.raw:
I might be trying too hard to get weird behaviours. So I tried this:

1) Insert a box

2) On the inspector, add a visual

3) Edit the new visual's pose to x = 1, roll = 1.57, apply

4) Select the part and scale it, the two visuals scale in different directions.

I know this is a very improbable situation, and fixing it will probably be very complicated because you'd probably have to check the orientation of each child, but I thought I should point it out anyway.
content.html:
I might be trying too hard to get weird behaviours. So I tried this:

1) Insert a box

2) On the inspector, add a visual

3) Edit the new visual's pose to x = 1, roll = 1.57, apply

4) Select the part and scale it, the two visuals scale in different directions.

I know this is a very improbable situation, and fixing it will probably be very complicated because you'd probably have to check the orientation of each child, but I thought I should point it out anyway.
